citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
**During a review of the IACUC records, it was noted the IACUC had only conducted a facility inspection during 7/2024
which was approximately 13 months after the last inspection that was conducted in 6/2023. In accordance with Animal
Welfare Regulations, the Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC) is required to conduct a review of the
research facility's program for humane care and use of animals and to inspect the animal facilities at least once every six
months; and to submit a report of its evaluations to the Institutional Official at least once every six months to ensure the
humane care and use of the animals. The report must be signed by a majority of the Committee members and include a
statement pertaining to minority views, identify any deficiency as a minor or significant deficiency, and include details of a
plan for correction.
Correct by: Next semiannual evaluations/report.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
